entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
